import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Delete asset inventory action custom field values"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"delete"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/custom-fields/values/for/asset-inventory-actions/delete"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Deletes custom field values for one or more asset inventory actions based on the provided criteria.

**Key Behavior**:
- Allows bulk deletion of custom field values across multiple asset inventory actions
- Can filter by specific custom field types or delete all custom fields for specified actions
- Returns the count of deleted custom field values

**Prerequisites**:
1. **AssetInventoryActionIds** - Obtain asset inventory action UUIDs from asset inventory action search endpoints
2. **CustomFieldTypeIds** (optional) - If provided, only deletes values for these specific custom field types

**Workflow Example**:
1. Identify the asset inventory actions and extract their `AssetInventoryActionId` values
2. Optionally, identify specific custom field types to delete via [POST /api/v1.0/custom-fields/for/asset-inventory-action](/docs/api/custom-fields/get-custom-fields-for-asset-inventory-action)
3. Call this endpoint with the delete request payload

**Minimal Required Fields**: IncludePkIds array (containing AssetInventoryActionId values)

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Request payload for deleting custom field values. Supports targeting specific custom fields and/or specific entity records through include/exclude lists.","properties":{"CustomFieldIds":{"type":"array","nullable":true,"items":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"description":"Array of custom field IDs to delete values for. When specified, only values for these custom fields are deleted. When null/empty, all custom field values matching the entity filters are deleted.","x-obtained-from":{"operationId":"searchCustomFields","endpoint":"POST /api/v1.0/custom-fields","responseField":"Items[].CustomFieldId"}},"IncludePkIds":{"type":"array","nullable":true,"items":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"description":"Array of entity IDs (AssetId, TicketId, UserId, EventId) to delete custom field values for. When specified, only custom field values for these entities are deleted. Use this to target specific records."},"ExcludePkIds":{"type":"array","nullable":true,"items":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"description":"Array of entity IDs to exclude from deletion. Custom field values for these entities will NOT be deleted even if they match other criteria. Use this to protect specific records when doing bulk deletes."}},"example":{"CustomFieldIds":["e7c8b30d-d899-4193-a70b-21994d2a8089"],"IncludePkIds":["546f841c-32d8-47e5-bfc1-a4f21754d6d3"],"ExcludePkIds":[]},"title":"DeleteCustomFieldValuesRequest"},"examples":{"deleteAllCustomFields":{"summary":"Delete all custom field values for asset inventory actions","description":"Deletes all custom field values for specified asset inventory actions","value":{"IncludePkIds":["e1f2a3b4-c5d6-7890-abcd-ef1234567890","f2a3b4c5-d6e7-8901-bcde-f12345678901"]}},"deleteSpecificCustomFields":{"summary":"Delete specific custom field values","description":"Deletes only the specified custom field types for the asset inventory actions","value":{"CustomFieldIds":["e7c8b30d-d899-4193-a70b-21994d2a8089"],"IncludePkIds":["e1f2a3b4-c5d6-7890-abcd-ef1234567890"]}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
